00141 void PluginManager::LoadAvailablePlugins( QDir pluginsDirectory )
00142 {
00143         QStringList filesList;
00144         BuildFileList( pluginsDirectory, filesList );
00145         foreach( QString fileName, filesList ) LoadTonatiuhPlugin( fileName );
00146 }
00147 
00151 void PluginManager::AddFilesToList( QDir directory, QStringList& filesList )
00152 {
00153         QString directoryPath( directory.absolutePath().append( QLatin1String( "/" ) ) );
00154 
00155     QStringList filenamesList = directory.entryList( QDir::Files, QDir::Unsorted );
00156     for( int i = 0; i < filenamesList.size(); ++i )
00157         filesList << ( directoryPath + filenamesList[i] );
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00165 void PluginManager::BuildFileList( QDir directory, QStringList& filesList )
00166 {
00167         AddFilesToList( directory, filesList );
00168 
00169         QString directoryPath( directory.absolutePath().append( QLatin1String( "/" ) ) );
00170     QStringList subdirectoriesList = directory.entryList( QDir::Dirs, QDir::Unsorted );
00171 
00172    for( int i = 0; i< subdirectoriesList.size(); ++i )
00173    {
00174         QString subdirectoryName = subdirectoriesList[i];
00175                 if( ValidDirectoryName( subdirectoryName ) )
00176                         BuildFileList( QDir( directoryPath + subdirectoryName ), filesList );
00177         }
00178 
00179 }
00180 
00181 void PluginManager::LoadMaterialPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00182 {
00183 
00184         TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory = qobject_cast<TMaterialFactory* >( plugin );
00185         if( !pTMaterialFactory )  tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Material plug-in not recognized" );
00186         pTMaterialFactory->CreateTMaterial();
00187         m_materialFactoryList.push_back( pTMaterialFactory );
00188 }
00189 
00190 void PluginManager::LoadPhotonMapPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00191 {
00192         TPhotonMapFactory* pTPhotonMapFactory = qobject_cast<TPhotonMapFactory* >( plugin );
00193         if( !pTPhotonMapFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: PhotonMap plug-in not recognized" );;
00194         m_photonmapFactoryList.push_back( pTPhotonMapFactory );
00195 }
00196 
00200 void PluginManager::LoadRandomDeviatePlugin( QObject* plugin )
00201 {
00202         RandomDeviateFactory* pRamdomDeviateFactory = qobject_cast<RandomDeviateFactory* >( plugin );
00203         m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.push_back( pRamdomDeviateFactory );
00204 
00205 }
00206 
00207 void PluginManager::LoadShapePlugin( QObject* plugin )
00208 {
00209         TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory = qobject_cast<TShapeFactory* >( plugin );
00210         if ( !pTShapeFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Shape plug-in not recognized" );
00211         //if( pTShapeFactory->IsFlat() )        m_TFlatShapeFactoryList.push_back( pTShapeFactory );
00212         pTShapeFactory->CreateTShape();
00213         m_shapeFactoryList.push_back( pTShapeFactory );
00214 }
00215 
00216 void PluginManager::LoadSunshapePlugin( QObject* plugin )
00217 {
00218     TSunShapeFactory* pTSunShapeFactory = qobject_cast<TSunShapeFactory* >( plugin );
00219     if( !pTSunShapeFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: SunShape plug-in not recognized" );                    ;
00220         pTSunShapeFactory->CreateTSunShape( );
00221         m_sunshapeFactoryList.push_back( pTSunShapeFactory );
00222 }
00223 
00224 void PluginManager::LoadTrackerPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00225 {
00226     TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory = qobject_cast< TTrackerFactory* >( plugin );
00227     if( !pTTrackerFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Tracker plug-in not recognized" );
00228         pTTrackerFactory->CreateTTracker( );
00229         m_trackerFactoryList.push_back( pTTrackerFactory );
00230 }

00235 void PluginManager::LoadTransmissivityPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00236 {
00237         TTransmissivityFactory* pTTransmissivityFactory = qobject_cast< TTransmissivityFactory* >( plugin );
00238     if( !pTTransmissivityFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Transmissivity plug-in not recognized" );
00239     pTTransmissivityFactory->CreateTTransmissivity( );
00240     m_transmissivityFactoryList.push_back( pTTransmissivityFactory );
00241 }

00243 
00247 void PluginManager::LoadTonatiuhPlugin( const QString& fileName )
00248 {
00249         QPluginLoader loader( fileName );
00250     QObject* plugin = loader.instance();
00251     if ( plugin != 0)
00252     {
00253         if( plugin->inherits( "RandomDeviateFactory" ) ) LoadRandomDeviatePlugin( plugin );
00254         if( plugin->inherits( "TShapeFactory" ) ) LoadShapePlugin( plugin );
00255         if( plugin->inherits( "TSunShapeFactory" ) ) LoadSunshapePlugin( plugin );
00256         if( plugin->inherits( "TMaterialFactory" ) ) LoadMaterialPlugin( plugin );
00257         if( plugin->inherits( "TPhotonMapFactory" ) ) LoadPhotonMapPlugin( plugin );
00258         if( plugin->inherits( "TTrackerFactory" ) ) LoadTrackerPlugin( plugin );
00259         if( plugin->inherits( "TTransmissivityFactory" ) ) LoadTransmissivityPlugin( plugin );
00260         }
00261 }
00262 
00267 bool PluginManager::ValidDirectoryName( QString& directoryName  )
00268 {
00269         return ( directoryName != QLatin1String( "." ) ) && ( directoryName != QLatin1String( ".." ) );
00270 }
